variable.name: BODY_MASS_INDEX
variable.comment: Non-pregnant BMIs (do not include BMIs during pregnancy or 9 months after pregnancy); calculate BMI whenever there is a distinct weight using the closest height (forward or backward) up to 5 years. If the subject's age at weight observation is < 20Kg, go forward or backwards up to a year; if there are 2 closest heights (froward or backward), select either of them to calculate BMI. External variable resource: caBig; source ID: C16358

variable.name: WEIGHT
variable.description: Subject's weight in kilograms over time
variable.comment: Non-pregnant weights (do not include weights during pregnancy or 9 months after pregnancy). External variable resource: caBig; source ID: C25208

variable.name: HEIGHT
variable.description: Subject's height in cm over time
variable.comment: One observation age corresponds to one height. If more than one height value is available for the same observation age, use the median value. External variable resource: caBig; source ID: C25347

variable.name: AGE_OBSERVATION
variable.description: Age when clinical event was recorded in record
